segments.text: I am not sure what to do to get ready for my job interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure that you understand the company . Do you understand what it is that they do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I probably need to do some more research .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you've finished your research it will help you figure out whether your company is rigid in philosophy or kind of more relaxed . Does that make sense ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that their attitude is rather casual .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So all of that information will help you to pick out what to wear . Do you have something to wear ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have absolutely nothing so far .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know I could go shopping with you sometime if you need it , but can we talk about other basics ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , where should we go from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Focus on being relaxed and open , don't forget to smile and shake hands and be genuinely interested in what their company is about . I'm sure you'll do well .
segments.speaker: S2
